name: RepliDAO
description: RepliDAO seeks to disrupt the control that major corporations have over tech by building a platform for engineers and hobbyists to collaborate, design, and offer alternative tech products to anyone. Replimakers will host projects on the platform that will include 3D enclosures, circuit board schematics, and firmware for sale or for free. These products will be verified and endorsed by the DAO and will be presented to users in a standardized in an easy to understand format.
